description: Alex, the originator of Varde Tech AS, has type 1 diabetes and holds a master's degree in artificial intelligence. His unique background equips him to lead Varde's mission of empowering people with diabetes through innovative AI solutions.

Peshang Alo, co-founder and CTO of Varde Tech AS, holds a master's degree in artificial intelligence and brings extensive experience in software development. His expertise drives the technical development of Varde's AI solutions, ensuring accuracy and reliability in managing diabetes.

Rasmus Nicolay Pripp, CFO of Varde Tech AS, holds a master's degree in entrepreneurship and finance. His expertise in financial strategy, risk management, and business development ensures the company's sustainable growth and long-term success.

Sondre Simensen Bergane, CMO of Varde Tech AS, holds a master's degree in entrepreneurship and innovation. With his background in business development and marketing, he leads Vardeâ€™s strategy for market penetration and brand growth, ensuring the company reaches and connects with its target audience effectively.
